column6: It's fight night! The X-Men battle it out with their mysterious new foes, The Children, right above the Xavier Institute!  And when the dust clears, what decision does Rogue make that will shake the X-Men to their core?!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Antonio Fabela | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
